function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential community spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 in tourism destinations due to reduced risk perception and information mismanagement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative influence on country and destination image due to misinformation and racial references related to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of detail-oriented behavior and increased spontaneous trait inferences leading to risk of epidemic spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological distance and construal level theory influencing perceived risk in tourism contexts may lead to inaccurate risk perceptions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Individuals’ varying construal of psychological distance and covid-19-related risk perceptions may lead to inconsistent travel willingness and preferences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dissemination of negative messages through social media may exacerbate country image problems and increase anxiety among tourists.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in small accommodation units due to shortened social distance with tourists","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in tourist preferences due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased preference for private transportation over public transportation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived health risks related to covid-19 in tourism activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological risks related to anxiety and fear about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists consuming foreign or exotic foods may be blamed for disease transmission, leading to social risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biased risk perceptions of covid-19, with individuals perceiving their own risk as lower than others.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in risk perceptions based on demographic characteristics, cultural background, and socio-psychological features.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists may engage in novelty-seeking behavior, leading to increased risk of contracting contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wildlife consumption by tourists may lead to the transmission of zoonotic diseases and global health epidemics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public concern and criticism of wildlife consumption may lead to heated debates and social unrest, impacting tourism and local communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists modifying transportation modes to prefer self-driving tours or recreational vehicles, leading to potential increase in road accidents and traffic congestion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists avoiding public transport due to fear of contracting illnesses, leading to decreased usage of public transport and potential overcrowding of roads and highways.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for private car services leading to decreased social distancing and increased risk of disease transmission within the vehicle.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological reservations affecting destination choices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk perception leading to modification of destination preferences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tendency to travel with socially close companions and avoid strangers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission through human-to-human interaction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists’ expressions of conservative attitudes may impact their behavior in ways that increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourists avoiding high-risk areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes in response to perceived risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Demographic variation in response to perceived risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compromised destination image and tourism market due to inappropriate media coverage of the virus’s origins.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time-related costs and frustrations due to quarantine-related measures during the epidemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of psychological distance on tourists’ risk perceptions and behavioral changes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading media coverage of contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization of locations affected by contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate labeling and misinformation about contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social risk related to negative attitudes from friends, family, and associates due to covid-19 travel","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Performance risk in tourism due to covid-19 travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Image risk of a country due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of higher covid-19 infection risk due to proximity to out-group members and unfamiliar environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological risk associated with undesirable travel experience and pandemic-related anxiety","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social risk related to negative changes in others’ opinions and attitudes towards travelers in a tourism context","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived uncertainty of infection and negative outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of affected areas and neighboring countries to crisis events and negative destination image","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in risk perception between tourists, policymakers, and industry practitioners","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-power representations of nuclear energy result in abstract construal, leading to reduced risk perception and increased optimism, potentially affecting attitudes towards nuclear energy.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological closeness to environmental pollution leads to a more concrete threat perception and greater perceived risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximate psychological distance and low-level construal may lead to reduced risk perception of covid-19, potentially impacting safety behaviors and precautionary measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective perceived risk in travel context influences tourists’ destination choices and travel behavior.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tourism industry is highly susceptible to internal and external stimuli, including perceived risk in crisis contexts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
